data.oai_dc:dc: These data describe the functional responses of experimental large herbivore exclusion, collected from a Web Of Science search. The dataset includes functional responses on their own lines (e.g. multiple functional responses could be recorded at one site, within one publication), and includes information on: publication, exclosure experiment, and which ecosystem function was examined.
carbon cycle|ecosystem function|ecosystem resilience and resistance|exclosure experiment|large herbivore loss|nutrient cycling|plant regeneration|primary productivity
